attributes.additional_details:
In the event of a NO win the citizens of the UK need a guarantee of stability and a chance to build a better UK together that builds the fairer society that we all desire.
We would respectfully request that there be no more referendums on scottish independence for at least  30 years in law in order.

We must have it in law that the vote is the settled will of the majority of the scottish people and not have us go through this uncertainty again in this generation.

Thank you
